Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion 15-n210us 15.6-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Dwight M.
Reviews.Content: A great computer for the price.  Runs fast and after 6 months of use no issues.  Fine for an everyday laptop.  Well designed and will do most anything you need out of a laptop.  Great size and light weight to throw in your suitcase for a short trip.  This is defiantly not for anyone into video games.  It does not have that type of speed or graphics.  This is just a good all a round laptop for everyday use and you can't beat the price.  I paid around $400 with shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great entry level lpatop
Reviews.Author: JLP
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a bargain in an entry level lap top then this HP is for you.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: Good laptop for a basic user. Would expect it to be faster. Charms bar on right side randomly pops up--one feature of Windows 8 that is beyond irritating. Good for someone with basic on-the-go computer needs

Reviews.Title: Hp Laptop
Reviews.Author: Zibuyisile Khumalo
Reviews.Content: I choose HP because I have hearted that it's the best and I also googled the best brand which came up to be Apple and HP so I choose this one. I would recommend it to everyone who is looking for a quality and affordable laptop or brand.
